TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class StackPanel Inherits Panel Implements IScrollInfo

summary.span: 將子元素排成單一行，以水平或垂直方式排列。

span.span: Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 預設值是 「 延展 」 同時和內容中所包含的。The default value is stretch for both and of content that is contained in a . 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要強迫要接收焦點的控制台項目，設定屬性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. 實作介面，以支援邏輯捲動。 implements the interface to support logical scrolling. 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 這是相較於實體捲動，其中定義實體的增量，以指定的方向捲動內容。This is in contrast to physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不適用於您的程式碼。This property is not intended to be used in your code. 為了滿足介面合約公開公開 ()。It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (). 設定此屬性沒有任何作用。Setting this property has no effect. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝中並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定如何內的項目堆疊 （其他或並排顯示上一個）。The following example shows how to use the property to specify how elements within a are stacked (one on top of the other or side by side). [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelOrientationExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/OrientationExample.xaml#stackpanelorientationexamplewholepage)] 下列螢幕擷取畫面顯示此範例中的呈現方式。The screenshot below shows how this example renders. ![StackPanel 的方向](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel 的方向")![StackPanel orientation](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel orientation")
